Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by New York (N) in 1991...
Injured on 5/25/1991 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/5/1993 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Boston on 3/2/1997 (Going to CHC: 3B M. Lowell. Going to BOS: C M. Lieberthal, 1B R. Branyan)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1997, off Gerald Alexander (BAL)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1997, hitting .263 with 9 HR, 60 RBI...
